The cave goblin guards guard the Dorgeshuun Mines. They can be seen patrolling the mines with their boney spears or clubs. They protect the cave goblin miners, and will command, "Stop that!", and begin to attack you if you are spotted assaulting a miner.

  • 2 Drops
